Inc.","details":"Implements the traditional PE/VC fee model:      MANAGEMENT FEES:      - Paid in cash (stablecoin) from fund assets to GP wallet      - Fee basis is committed capital or invested capital per the LPA      - Reduces fund NAV directly (not token dilution)      - Typically 1.5-2% annually      CARRIED INTEREST:      - Paid in cash from distribution proceeds following the waterfall      - Return of capital \u2192 preferred return \u2192 GP catch-up \u2192 profit split      - No token minting\u2014carry is part of the batched distribution transaction      - Typically 20% above 8% hurdle      NAV CALCULATION:      - Accrued but unpaid fees are deducted for accurate mid-quarter NAV      - Net NAV = Gross Assets - Liabilities - Accrued Fees","errors":{"AccessControl_CallerIsNotAuthorized(address,bytes4)":[{"params":{"caller":"Address attempting the call","functionSig":"Function selector that was called"}}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token Calculates fees since last accrual.","params":{"currentNAV":"Current net asset value for NAV-based fees"},"returns":{"accruedAmount":"Amount of fees accrued this call (in payment token)"}},"calculateCarry(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Called during distribution to split proceeds between LPs and GP per waterfall.      Carry is paid in cash as part of the distribution batch, not via token minting.      Waterfall:      1. Return of capital to LPs      2. Preferred return (hurdle) to LPs      3. GP catch-up (optional, not implemented here)      4. params.paymentToken: Stablecoin token for fee payments (e.g., USDC)

accrueManagementFee(uint256).details: Can be called by anyone. Calculates fees since last accrual.

params.currentNAV: Current net asset value for NAV-based fees

returns.accruedAmount: Amount of fees accrued this call (in payment token)

calculateCarry(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Called during distribution to split proceeds between LPs and GP per waterfall.      Carry is paid in cash as part of the distribution batch, not via token minting.      Waterfall:      1. Return of capital to LPs      2. Preferred return (hurdle) to LPs      3. GP catch-up (optional, not implemented here)      4. Profit split per carry percentage

returns.carryAmount: Amount going to GP as carry

getNetNAV(uint256).details: Net NAV = Gross Assets - Liabilities - Accrued Mgmt Fees      This gives LPs the "after-fee" value of their position.

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

recordCarryPaid(uint256).details: Called after distribution batch to track carry paid

setFeeConfig((uint256,uint256,uint256,ad.details: Only admin can update. Changes apply to future accruals.

settleManagementFee(uint256).details: Transfers stablecoin from this contract (fund wallet) to the fee recipient (GP).      The fund must hold sufficient stablecoin balance.      This is the traditional PE/VC model - cash payment, not token dilution.

params.currentNAV: Current NAV for final accrual calculation

returns.feesPaid: Amount of stablecoin transferred to GP

updateFeeBaseValue(uint256).details: For COMMITTED or CALLED fee base. Called when commitments or calls change.

accrueManagementFee(uint256).notice: Accrue management fees based on time elapsed

calculateCarry(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculate carried interest for a distribution

calculatePendingAccrual(uint256).notice: Calculate accrued fees without updating state (view)

getAccruedFees().notice: Get accrued but unpaid management fees

getNetNAV(uint256).notice: Calculate Net NAV after deducting accrued fees

getPaymentToken().notice: Get the payment token used for fee settlement

isFeeAccrualInitialized().notice: Check if fee accrual is initialized

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

settleManagementFee(uint256).notice: Settle accrued management fees by paying stablecoin to GP

updateFeeBaseValue(uint256).notice: Update the fee base value (called by other facets)
